parsedComplaintsResult.impact: This issue can cause confusion and uncertainty about whether the vehicle is in park, leading to potential safety risks, such as the vehicle rolling or not shutting off.
symptoms: Intermittent "Shift to Park" message on the dashboard
vehicle not recognizing it is in park
inability to shut off the vehicle
horn and lights activation.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Issues (Shuddering, Stuttering, and Loss of Power)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: These issues can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential transmission failure.
symptoms: Shuddering or stuttering when accelerating
loss of power
violent shaking
and hesitation between gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: These issues can cause engine damage, overheating, and loss of power.
symptoms: Temperature gauge reading zero
thermostat failure
reduced steering assist
and check engine light illumination.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: These issues can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential transmission failure.
symptoms: Hesitation or failure to accelerate
extended braking distance
and sudden loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the shifter assembly can cause the vehicle to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to shift into park, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to recognize that it is in park
the dashboard displays a "Shift to Park" message
the vehicle will not shut off
the starter button will not turn off
the gear selector switch is illuminated in P
the vehicle is unable to turn off
the doors may lock or unlock unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission control switch can cause the vehicle to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to shift into park, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to recognize that it is in park
the dashboard displays a "Shift to Park" message
the vehicle will not shut off
the starter button will not turn off
the gear selector switch is illuminated in P.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the body control module can cause various electrical issues, including the malfunction of the shifter assembly, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to recognize that it is in park
the dashboard displays a "Shift to Park" message
the vehicle will not shut off
the starter button will not turn off
the gear selector switch is illuminated in P.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to detect the car being in park can prevent the car from turning off or locking, posing a significant safety risk to the driver and others around the vehicle.
symptoms: The dashboard displays a "Shift to Park" message
accompanied by a loud dinging sound
even when the car is already in park. The car may not turn off or lock
and the driver may be unable to differentiate between whether the car is actually in park or not.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The steering control error can cause the AC to stop working, the temperature gauge to malfunction, and the vehicle to stall, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The dashboard displays a "Steering Control Error" message
the AC stops working
the temperature gauge exceeds zero
and the vehicle may stall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the battery to drain, the ESC warning light to come on, and the auto stop feature to malfunction, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The ESC warning light comes on
the battery drains
and the auto stop feature malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the infotainment system can cause the screen to display inappropriate messages, the radio to malfunction, and the OnStar system to fail, which can be distracting and pose a safety risk.
symptoms: The screen displays inappropriate messages
the radio malfunctions
and the OnStar system fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Thermostat Causing Steering Assist Reduction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty thermostat can cause the steering assist to be reduced, leading to a loss of power steering, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle displays a "Steering assist reduced - drive with care" message
the thermostatic fan runs at full speed
and the P0128 check engine code is illuminated. The temperature gauge may also get stuck at the cold position.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Shift to Park Error and Unresponsive Transmission
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle may not shift into park properly, causing the engine to remain running, and the vehicle may not turn off. This can lead to accidents or injuries if the vehicle is not properly secured.
symptoms: The vehicle displays a "Shift to Park" message even when the vehicle is already in park
the vehicle won't turn off
and excessive force is required to engage the park mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle may experience sudden slowdowns or acceleration, which can cause accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences sudden slowdowns
with the RPMs dropping
even when the throttle position is maintained. The vehicle may then regain speed and accelerate unpredictably.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Random Loss of Power Steering and Power Brakes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of power steering and power brakes can increase the risk of accidents, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power steering and power brakes without warning
making it difficult to control the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Failure Causing Power Steering and Brake Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty battery can cause the power steering and brakes to fail, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a failure of the power steering and brakes
and the battery may be internally corroded and unable to hold a charge.
